r.d:
Stagehand_CLIController provides a controller superclass to run a typical control flow of CLI such like the following:
* Parsing options and arguments * Configuring runtime components * Running the specified command
r.n:
What's New in Stagehand_CLIController 0.1.1
A defect fix:
A defect has been fixed that caused "Strict Standards: Non-static method ..." errors to be raised if E_STRICT is enabled.
